summary: Website for Twitch streamer with dual login (owner/user), partner/sponsor/affiliate tracking with paid subscriptions, Stripe integration, and promotional content
architectural_notes: Dual authentication system: owner admin access and standard user access
Pink and purple color scheme matching Twitch branding
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Moonlight Rebels logo with pink and purple gaming aesthetic featuring moon and rebel themes (logo.dim_400x400.png)
- Hero background with pink and purple gradient matching Twitch theme and gaming atmosphere (hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png)

existing_features.title: Implement owner/admin authentication system using Internet Identity that restricts access to admin features
Implement separate user authentication system using Internet Identity for regular users
Create partner/sponsor/affiliate tracking page that displays and manages partners, sponsors, and affiliates with paid subscription functionality
Integrate Stripe payment processing in the admin page for managing subscriptions
Design and implement pink and purple Twitch-themed visual design throughout the entire website matching the Moonlight Rebels brand
Add bio section that explains the story of a medical mute gamer girl and encourages visitors to follow her
Add button that links to the owner's Twitch channel at https://www.twitch.tv/auroramoonveil

new_feature_requests.summary: Partner/sponsor/affiliate tracking page with paid subscription
Bio section explaining medical mute gamer girl story
Button linking to Twitch channel https://www.twitch.tv/auroramoonveil
Store and manage partner, sponsor, and affiliate data in the backend including their details, categories, and subscription requirements
Implement subscription management system in the backend to track user subscription status and control access to premium content
